sec.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
sec.p: All sampling of animals was approved by the Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee of the Gansu Agricultural University under permit NO. 2012–2-159.

sec.title: Competing interests
sec.p: Delmer Davis is an employee of Ralco Nutrition Inc. David Casper is an employee of Furst-McNess Company. The authors declare that they have no competing interests.

sec.title: Publisher’s Note
sec.p: Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.
